mainVideoInfo.description:
Get Luck be a Landlord on Steam AND support me at the same time: https://www.nexus.gg/retromation/luck-be-a-landlord

Luck be a Champion: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2806118663
Vanilla B Gone: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2804818008
Placeholders: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2912516816

Luck be a Landlord is a roguelike drafting game / deckbuilder about using a slot machine to earn rent money and defeat capitalism. This game does not contain any real-world currency gambling or microtransactions.

The Let's Try series is a way to preview / review games in order to get my first impressions through the first moments of gameplay.

Support the channel on Patreon to gain a bunch of different rewards:
http://patreon.com/retromation

➡ Thank you to my supporters on https://www.patreon.com/retromation
➡ 3edgy5me863, Ashbinator, BigLow, Chrysophrase, 
Deadendsaint, Dysnomia, etheron369, Hephaestus, ihavehalfasoul, Junogray, JusticeTom, Kage_Shukuun, Little Hink, MoreThanAwesome, Nydeleric, Osoleve, Patrica, Piegood, ProjectLlama, Riffler Underhill, Rostepher, Romulus, Sainey, Sebastian Benn, Skoore, SpaceTime, Spence, StormXVI, The Turtle, and Throwbo! 

Join my Discord‼ → https://discord.gg/beAJPAP
Join the Wholesomeverse Discord‼ → https://discord.gg/v7gzKsa

Subscribe for more Let's Tries: http://bit.ly/SubscribeRetromation

Your landlord is knocking on your door. You have one coin left to your name. You insert the coin into your slot machine...and...JACKPOT! Luck be a Landlord, tonight!


Features
Roguelite gameplay - The symbols you can add to the slot machine are different every time!
Lots of Symbols to add to your slot machine - Each symbol has different effects and interactions.
Plenty of Items to choose from - The items are different every time as well, leading to interesting build strategies.
A terrible landlord to defeat.
A dog you can pet.
Capitalism.

#LuckBeALandlord #Part36
